exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite M_sum.
exceptions.exn: The reference M_sum was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: reflexivity.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m u x = x X : Type sum, times : X -> X -> X zero, one : X sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x b : X f : nat -> X monoid_unit_l0 : forall x : X, o ⊗ x = x monoid_unit_r0 : forall x : X, x ⊗ o = x monoid_assoc0 : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z monoid_unit_l1 : forall x : X, z ⊕ x = x monoid_unit_r1 : forall x : X, x ⊕ z = x monoid_assoc1 : forall x y z : X, x ⊕ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊕ y ⊕ z Unable to unify "b ⊗ z" with "z".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite IHn.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "∑ n (fun i : nat => b ⊗ f i)" in the current goal.

exceptions.tactic: reflexivity.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m u x = x X : Type sum, times : X -> X -> X zero, one : X sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x b : X n : nat f : nat -> X IHn : ∑ n (fun i : nat => b ⊗ f i) = b ⊗ ∑ n f monoid_unit_l0 : forall x : X, o ⊗ x = x monoid_unit_r0 : forall x : X, x ⊗ o = x monoid_assoc0 : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z monoid_unit_l1 : forall x : X, z ⊕ x = x monoid_unit_r1 : forall x : X, x ⊕ z = x monoid_assoc1 : forall x y z : X, x ⊕ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊕ y ⊕ z Unable to unify "b ⊗ f 0 ⊕ b ⊗ ∑ n (fun n : nat => f (S n))" with "b ⊗ f 0 ⊕ ∑ n (fun n : nat => b ⊗ f (S n))".

original: intros X times sum one zero M_sum sum_comm sum_cancel M_times distr_l distr_r b n f. induction n. - simpl. apply monoid_unit_l with (m:=sum) (u:=zero) in M_sum. rewrite M_sum. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite distr_l. rewrite IHn. reflexivity.
